verbose_text: The PI3K / AKT inhibitor, LY294002, and the mTOR inhibitor, rapamycin, largely neutralized the protective effects of niacin, suggesting that AKT and downstream signaling mTOR/S6 activation are necessary for the niacin induced protective effects against UV induced cell death and cell apoptosis.
evidence: niacin-induced protective effects against UV-induced cell death and cell apoptosis
